prompt: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

cards.name: Harry Potter
cards.bio: The protagonist and Triwizard Tournament contender, known for his bravery and the lightning bolt scar on his forehead.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Harry Potter with a wand and a lightning bolt scar on his forehead

cards.name: Ron Weasley
cards.bio: Harry's loyal friend with a knack for chess and a fear of spiders, known for his red hair.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Ron Weasley with red hair and a chess piece

cards.name: Hermione Granger
cards.bio: Brilliant and book-smart, Hermione is an indispensable ally with a talent for spells and potions.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hermione Granger reading a book with a wand in her hand

cards.name: Viktor Krum
cards.bio: The Bulgarian Quidditch seeker and Durmstrang's Triwizard champion, known for his athleticism and brooding appearance.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Viktor Krum in Quidditch robes holding a snitch

cards.name: Fleur Delacour
cards.bio: The Beauxbatons Academy's Triwizard champion, known for her beauty and Veela charm.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Fleur Delacour with silver hair and a Beauxbatons uniform

cards.name: Cedric Diggory
cards.bio: The noble and fair Hufflepuff student, chosen as Hogwarts' second Triwizard champion.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Cedric Diggory with a Hufflepuff scarf holding a Triwizard Cup

cards.name: Albus Dumbledore
cards.bio: The wise and powerful Headmaster of Hogwarts, with a long silver beard and half-moon spectacles.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Albus Dumbledore with a phoenix and the Elder Wand

cards.name: Mad-Eye Moody
cards.bio: The grizzled ex-Auror with a magical eye, known for his paranoia and unconventional teaching methods.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Mad-Eye Moody with a magical eye and a staff

cards.name: Severus Snape
cards.bio: The enigmatic Potions Master with a talent for occlumency and a mysterious past.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Severus Snape in black robes with a potion vial

cards.name: Sirius Black
cards.bio: Harry's godfather and an Animagus, falsely accused and imprisoned, known for his loyalty to his friends.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Sirius Black transforming into a large black dog

cards.name: Lord Voldemort
cards.bio: The main villain, also known as Tom Riddle, with a serpentine appearance and a quest for immortality.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Lord Voldemort with a wand casting the Avada Kedavra curse
